name: Microsoft Teams UI Kit
description:
The Microsoft Teams UI Kit includes core components, scenario-based templates, and best practices for designing Teams apps that users love. The kit details all app capabilities and shows common use cases to help inspire your design. It also covers fundamental design concepts (such as responsive sizing and accessibility). You can easily grab design elements and modify them as needed, giving you more time to create the best experience for your users. 


WHAT'S NEW in v2.3:


The latest version makes it easier than ever to design high-quality Teams apps with these new and updated features.

• New Camera Effects capability and guidelines

• Updated designs for Alerts

• New Data Visualizations templates: Scatter Plot Chart, Bubble

Chart and Stream Graph

• New Date Range Picker in Basic UI Components


Visit https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/platform/overview for further documentation.
